patthana8.7:4.1: Naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.7:6.1: Naappaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.7:7.1: Nasappaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.7:8.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve … pe … upanissaye dve … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
